MAXIMUM_FUNDING.details: transfers bigger than maximum value should be done directly

MINIMUM_FUNDING.details: user can only hire a worker if he sends more than minimum value

stateOf.details: mapping from worker to its internal state

userOf.details: mapping from worker to its user

acceptJob().notice: Called by the worker to accept the job

isAvailable(address).notice: Returns true if worker node is available

isPending(address).notice: Returns true if worker node is pending

rejectJob().notice: Called by the worker to reject a job offer
